text:
Kenneth Lynch, OBE (18 March 1938 – 18 December 2019) was an English rock singer-songwriter, entertainer and actor. He appeared in many variety shows in the 1960s. His best known single was "You Can Never Stop Me Loving You". An actor, his best known role were in "Carry On Loving" and "The Playbirds".
He died in the early hours of 18 December 2019 of cancer, aged 81.

annotations.surface_form: You Can Never Stop Me Loving You
